00024 typedef __uint128_t uint128_t;
00025 
00026 typedef uint64_t ya_name_t;
00027 typedef uint8_t  ya_type_t;

00029 #define YA_NODE_TYPE_NULL              0    
00030 #define YA_NODE_TYPE_LEAF              1    
00031 #define YA_NODE_TYPE_BRANCH            2    
00032 #define YA_NODE_TYPE_TEXT              3    
00033 #define YA_NODE_TYPE_POSITIVE_INTEGER  4    
00034 #define YA_NODE_TYPE_NEGATIVE_INTEGER  5    
00035 #define YA_NODE_TYPE_BINARY_FLOAT      6    
00036 #define YA_NODE_TYPE_DECIMAL_FLOAT     7    
00037 
00038 #define YA_NODE_TYPE_LIST              254  
00039 #define YA_NODE_TYPE_COUNT             255

00043 struct ya_position_s {
00044     uint32_t        line;       
00045     uint32_t        column;     
00046     uint32_t        file;       
00047 } __attribute__((packed, aligned(4)));
00048 typedef struct ya_position_s ya_position_t;
00049 
00054 struct ya_node_s {
00055     ya_name_t           name;       
00056     uint64_t            size;       
00057     ya_position_t       position;   
00058     uint16_t            reserved_1; 
00059     uint8_t             reserved_2; 
00060     ya_type_t           type;       
00061     char                data[];     
00062 } __attribute__((packed, aligned(8)));
00063 typedef struct ya_node_s ya_node_t;
00064 
00068 typedef struct {
00069     uint64_t        size;       //< Size including header and padding.
00070     ya_position_t   position;   //< Position where the start of the node is located in the source file.
00071     ya_type_t       type;       //< The type of node.
00072     ya_node_t       *node;      //< The complete data, including the header.
00073 } ya_t;
00074 
00075 extern ya_t ya_start;
00076 
00079 #define YYSTYPE ya_t
00080 
00085 static inline ya_name_t ya_create_name(const char * restrict s)
00086 {
00087     unsigned int    i;
00088     unsigned int    s_len = strlen(s);
00089     ya_name_t       name = 0;
00090 
00091     for (i = 0; i < sizeof (name); i++) {
00092         name <<= 8;
00093         if (i < s_len) {
00094             // String is left justified.
00095             name |= s[i];
00096         } else {
00097             // With trailing spaces.
00098             name |= ' ';
00099         }
00100     }
00101     return name;
00102 }
00103
